articles.title: Elon Musk threatens Pentagon leakers after NYT report on secret China war briefing - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “They will be found,” warns U.S. President Donald Trump’s billionaire adviser as White House lashes out at the media.
articles.content: “China will not even be mentioned or discussed,” Trump wrote in a post on his Truth Social platform. “How disgraceful it is that the discredited media can make up such lies. Anyway, the story is comp… [+664 chars]

articles.title: Detentions of European tourists at US borders spark fears of traveling to America - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. authorities have arrested and detained Canadian and European travelers at U.S. borders in recent weeks. German tourist Lucas Sielaff says he spent 16 days in detention in San Diego before being allowed to return to Germany. He says he was accused of livi…
